summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the GPU-accelerated ndimage filtering functions in cupyx.scipy, covering generic and fast filters, array ordering, dimensionality, axis handling, mode and origin parameters, edge cases, weight data types, and internal sorting algorithms.
business_intent: Guarantee that the cupyx.ndimage filter implementations produce correct and reliable results across diverse scenarios, matching expected SciPy behavior and handling error conditions, thereby supporting robust GPU-accelerated image processing in production environments.
